data.name: Crashed Lander Demo
data.detailed_description:
Outwit gravity, race the clock, explore new worlds.

Crashed lander is a gravity-based arcade game inspired by classics like Lunar Lander and Space Taxi. You've built a janky craft out of propane tanks and spare parts. Pilot it from pad to pad trying to beat your best time – then flirt with that fine line between speed and control.

If you’re brave enough to try Hard Mode you’ll be flopping around like a QWOPy, low gravity turtle. With a little practice you’ll be zippin' around doin' barrel rolls. You’ll see sites from the cutting edge of fractal mathematics – bizarre, organic shapes, arcane archaeological digs, and all manner of WTFderful alien vistas. Each level is a detailed hand-crafted landscape that encourages the player to explore - and goof around! You can also pilot your lander in virtual reality with your Oculus Rift.

Free demo includes 5 levels. Full version includes:

  • 24 levels to conquer and explore in pad Hopper mode
  • 20 levels in Ring Runner mode - fly through custom courses
  • Pad Hopper, Fuel Miser and Ring Runner high scores
  • Full Oculus Rift support
  • Full (xbox 360) controller support
  • Hidden collectibles on every level
  • Earn stars and track your progress through all 44 levels
  • An hour of spacey, glitch-hop music - mp3's included!
  • Windows - OSX and Linux versions coming soon.

Note: The Windows version of the demo is for 64bit systems only - 32bit will be added soon. The full version works with both.

data.short_description: Outwit gravity, race the clock, explore new worlds.Crashed lander is a gravity-based arcade game inspired by classics like Lunar Lander and Space Taxi. You'll pilot your craft from pad to pad trying to beat your best time – then flirt with that fine line between speed and control.
data.reviews:
“a core game flight mechanic that will keep you entertained for hours”
Virtual Reality Reviewer

“it's set in a wonderfully bizarre alien world that's absolutely worth exploring”
IndieGames

“Crashed lander is really great! Play it with the autopilot off though”
Bennett Foddy

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP
  • Processor: Dual Core 2 GhZ
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 4000
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Additional Notes: May run on lower-end machines at lower graphics settings.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 or equivalent
  • Graphics: NVidia 560ti or equivalent
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: To run in VR mode at 75 fps, this should be considered minimum requirements.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS X
  • Processor: Dual Core 2 GhZ
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: May run on lower-end machines at lower graphics settings.
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: OS X
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 or equivalent
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: To run in VR mode at 75 fps, this should be considered minimum requirements.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 14
  • Processor: Dual Core 2 GhZ
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD4000 or equivalent
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Linux version is experimental, VR mode not fully supported yet in Oculus SDK 0.4.4
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 14
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 or equivalent
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVidia 560ti or equivalent
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: VR mode not fully supported yet in Oculus SDK 0.4.4
